price: wajib atasku tidak mengatakan sesuatu terhadap Allah, kecuali yang hak.  Sesungguhnya aku datang kepadamu dengan membawa bukti yang nyata dari Tuhan-mu, maka lepaskanlah Bani Isrā`īl(pergi) bersama aku".
arabic: حَقِيقٌ عَلَىٰٓ أَن لَّآ أَقُولَ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ إِلَّا ٱلۡحَقَّۚ قَدۡ جِئۡتُكُم بِبَيِّنَةٖ مِّن رَّبِّكُمۡ فَأَرۡسِلۡ مَعِيَ بَنِيٓ إِسۡرَٰٓءِيلَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: ḥaqīqun ʿalā an lā aqūla ʿalā al-lahi illā al-ḥaqa qad ji'tukum bibayyinatin min rabbikum fa-arsil maʿiya banī is'rāīla
